column5: Well what do you guys think?
Never tried Impulse but I use Gulp all the time and it works for me. Trigger X also works for me.
never used northland, gulp works for me. I also use a lot of powerbait.
I've been an avid PowerBait user but recently just bought TriggerX. IMO the jury is still out.
Tried it out what a Joke. Just another thing Northland has copied and called there own. Soon as I went back to Gulp. It was fish on save your money.
